projects.name: KEYLOGGER
projects.description: Keylogger used to record and monitor keys pressed, mouse clicks. It can also capture special keys. Give system info of OS and Wifi network information, sends update on email after intervals. Uses mouse and keyboard event handler and listeners.

projects.name: SHARE ME- SOCIAL MEDIA WEB APPLICATION
projects.description: A Social media web application made using Bootstrap, react and Sanity. Allow a user to share pictures socially which other people can like and comment on.

experiences.description: Proficient in utilizing Jenkins for automating tasks, including the creation of new integration jobs. Experienced in developing Python scripts for database query operations. Skilled in Data Integration projects such as HCCB and Bata, employing Java and Jolt transformers. Proficient in managing and uploading data using Jenkins and Kafka. Demonstrated capability in client interaction, encompassing requirement gathering, seamless integration, and onboarding processes. Proven track record in optimizing SQL queries to enhance performance. Proficient in backend tasks such as MDM upload and Java implementation and writing.
